briefTitle: Integrating Palliative Care Into Self-Management of Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Integrating Palliative Care Into Self-Management of Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Over the age of 21
* Stage I-IV breast cancer
* Live in the State of Connecticut
* Speak English
* Receiving any kind of treatment for breast cancer
* Prognosis of at least 6 months
